Package logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character
    This class is an abstract class that will be the base for every character in game, giving basic movability to the character.
    Club
    This class is the base of every weapon in the game giving basic movability to it.
    ConsoleController
    This class contains the game cycle of the console based game.
    Door
    This class represents a possible exit on the Map where the Hero can go in order to complete the current level
    Drunken
    This class represents a specific type of Guard (enemy).
    Game
    This class is responsible for the game loop.
    GameStartSet
    This class is a class that serves a variable controller for the new game to be created.
    Guard
    This class represents a specific type of Character.
    Hero
    This class represents a specific type of Character.
    Map
    This class is the text based storage for the in game characters/objects locations on the current Game being played.
    Ogre
    This class represents a specific type of Character.
    Rookie
    This class represents a specific type of Guard (enemy).
    Suspicious
    This class represents a specific type of Guard (enemy).
    TestDrunken
    This class represents a Drunken that is unable to move.
    TestOgre
    This class represents a Ogre that is unable to move.
    TestRookie
    This class represents a Rookie that is unable to move.
    TestSuspicious
    This class represents a Suspicious that is unable to move.
    Unlocker
    This class is used to represent possible exits openers for the Hero on the current Map.
    Weapon
    This class represents a weapon in the in the game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GuardPersonality
    This enum defines the possible types of Guards.
